summary.description: > CORRECT NAME OF TOOL COULD ALSO BE 'VARIDT 1.0' | variability of drug transporter database | Search for Drug Transporter Entries: | Examples: P-glycoprotein 1 ; BCRP ; OATP1B1 ; Oxaliplatin ; Lung cancer .. | Search Drug Transporter by Transporter Name: | J.
